comments:
Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a new Capability i,e new_file.mcap
2.Add default property i,e property1 and default operation i,e operation1 to new_file.mcap
3.Again Create a new Capability i,e new_file1.mcap
4.Add default property i,e property1 and default operation i,e operation1 to new_file1.mcap
5.now Create new  MRT i,e new_file2.mrt
6.Add two capabilities which has mentioned above to MRT i,e new_file2.mrt
7.Try to do Codegeneratin from new_file2.mrt, but could not generate and throws error which is shown below

Build ID: TPTP-4.4.0-200702211545

More information:

On adding two custom capabilities in MRT, which has same opration names then validation message has to show saying that selected custom capabilities has operations with same name so codegeneration fails.

Created an attachment (id=60771)
Patch to give error when 2 custom capabilities have same operations

Please apply this patch

Created an attachment (id=60772)
Patch to give error when 2 custom capabilities have same operations

Please apply this patch
The given patch is not valid, since it doesn't check the operation names for standard capabilities.

Created an attachment (id=60784)
Patch - gives error when 2 Mrt capabilities have same operations

This patch checks for operation names of each MRT capability, and gives error messages in the Problems view when 2 capabilities have same operation names.

Created an attachment (id=60787)
Patch - gives error when 2 Mrt capabilities have same operations

Validation message shows in the problems view when 2 capabilities with same operation name added to MRT file.
